sys_ux_client_script.name: Wait Short and Reset

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_fd52e41847aa6110552caf52736d433a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home Stylized">c58628648721ad1089790fe5dabb3528</macroponent><name>Wait Short and Reset</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api : { state : {idleMessage}, setState }, event, helpers : { timing : {setTimeout}}, imports}) {
    // Wait Short and Reset
    // After taking snapshot wait 20 seconds and reset the photobooth
    console.log("Begin Reset Wait 10 Seconds");
    setTimeout(() => {
        setState("currentMessage", idleMessage);
    }, 10000);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jon.lind</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-27 15:50:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>fd52e41847aa6110552caf52736d433a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Wait Short and Reset</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Photobooth App" source="x_snc_pb_app">baa73cb74742dd10552caf52736d43f1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Photobooth App">baa73cb74742dd10552caf52736d43f1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fd52e41847aa6110552caf52736d433a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jon.lind</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-27 16:14:58</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
